16.Summary

September 24, 2019 Tuesday by Girish Godage
AngularTutorial

Summary

Our app is done, however there are still a few more things which we should do:
  • change the type of any event properties (i.e. switch time to JS Date instead of string)
  • call an external API to get a real weather forecast
  • add validation to our form (make sure that the user fills in all of the mandatory data)
  • handle duplicates

and a few more interesting things. We will learn all about that in Part 2 of our tutorial. 

Important!
I am very happy that you reached this far. I would like to thank you and ask you for a small favor. If you didn't rate the previous lessons yet please either spend a few minutes and rate them or (as a summary of the entire tutorial) using the stars below.

Your feedback is very important to us! Once you vote (it's just a single click!) there will be optional form which let you leave comment to us. Please let us know what you liked and what you didn't like to help us make next tutorials better and better!
